registrationPage.title: Create Account
registrationPage.description: Register on our platform to get more features. With a basic subscription you can watch webinars and whitepapers and create shopping lists. If you add your company details, you can use all other e-commerce features.
registrationPage.conditionsDescription:
Your registration details will be checked by our Pfeiffer Vacuum Team within normal working hours. You’ll receive an acceptance or denial email afterwards. This may take up to two working days.

The registration is for business clients only, a registration of private persons is not possible.
registrationPage.linkDataProtection: You can find the data protection declaration here.
registrationPage.contentCTABoxHelpDescription: Our product experts are always available to answer your questions about our products and your applications.
registrationPage.contentCTABoxLoginTitle: Do you already have an account?
registrationPage.contentCTABoxLoginDescription: If you already have an account, log in here. If you forgot your password, you can also change it here.
